Text: RE nd version of Plan Cc Well do Geaccone Tracy PM After reviewing the budget yesterday we noticed that goodwill was still being amortized in We need to take that out of your numbers Jim and Kiri thought it was approximately million Thus PGG should have an IBIT of Please revise file and send back to me and copy Steve Schwarzbach thanks Tracy Original Message From OUTAMA DARRINGTON Sent Wednesday October PM To Geaccone Tracy Cc Winowitch Carolyn Giles Valerie Barnes Jim Subject nd version of Plan Hi Tracy Please see attached for the Plan that Stan Horton will be looking at tomorrow morning This version includes Intercompany interest expense that was not previously budgeted It also has a more detail breakout of capital expenditures For the OM detail pages we will not be able to give you the same breakout for our cost as you have requested Our GL is build on FERC accounts and is not condusive to SAP type sorting Also note that all OM are at this point still straight lined for the year The quarterly shaping of earnings will not be available until mid to late November There will be significant swing between quarters from these results to the final one Let me know if you have any questions
